News.headline: Ramsey Moore Community Cup U15 Tournament
News.page_title: Ramsey Moore Community Cup U15 Tournament
News.URL_keywords: Ramsey Moore Community Cup U15 Tournament
News.short_description: We still have space available for teams to join our Community Cup coming up Saturday 12th November
News.description:
At Dagenham & Redbridge we’re running the community cup competition again this year. We would like to invite all U15s sides to compete in this season's Dagenham & Redbridge Community Cup competition, taking place Saturday 12th November at Goals in Dagenham, off Ripple Road. 

Entry to the tournament is just £3 per player and this includes a ticket to our match against Gateshead later that afternoon. The managers will receive a complimentary ticket to the match, any parents who wish to attend with their child tickets will cost £6. 11 a side squads can enter two teams, and the tournament runs from 10am to 12pm. Following the tournament all teams are invited to watch the Daggers play and the winners and runners up of the tournament will be invited onto the pitch at half time to receive their medals. If this is of interest to you do let us know as soon as possible.

For more information or to book your team a place in the tournament please contact our commercial department by email: commercial@daggers.co.uk, by phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 33
